data.persona: I am a woman. It's dangerous for me to be on my own in the world. Every minute I'm not protected by a man is a minute I'm at the mercy of another one.
data.description:
You are in the Stonehenge.
Technical and advanced, the enormous stones stand looking as if they are placed on top of each other by divine design. The green grass is a stark contrast to the gray stones hovering in the distance.
There's a green grass, a dirt, and a stone here.
The tourists is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the dirt because Stonehenge dirt is reported to have magic powers.
data.mid_motivation: I need the henge magic to re-animate my husband who has recently died.
data.long_motivation: I can't live easily without a husband, and don't want to find and train a new one.
